sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import products from '../products'; import star from '../assets/star.png' import { Spinner } from '../components/Spinner/Spinner'; import axios from 'axios'; type Props = {}; const Product = (props: Props) => { const { id } = useParams() const [dataProduct, setDataProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchSingleProduct = async () => { axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/product/${id}`) .then(res => { //fetch and push into dataProduct setDataProduct(data => [...data, res.data]) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } fetchSingleProduct() }, [id]) if (dataProduct.length > 0) { console.log(dataProduct); } const product = products.find((prod) => prod._id === id ) return product ? (

{product.name}

{product.rating}

Ratings {product.numReviews}

{product.numReviews} Sold

${product.price}

Quantity

Product Specifications

Category

Stock

Brand

{product.category}

{product.countInStock}

{product.brand}

Product Description

{product.description}

) : }; export default Product;
